title: Black Canyon Of The Gunnison National Park: Accessibility
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Accessibility             Accessibility      The following facilities are accessible to those with mobility impairments:SOUTH RIMSouth Rim Visitor CenterRestrooms along South RimSouth Rim Campground  - 2 accessible camping sites, restroomsTomichi Point OverlookChasm View OverlookSunset View OverlookNORTH RIMRestroom at North Rim Ranger StationBalanced Rock OverlookThe Black Canyon MovieOur film shown at the South Rim Visitor Center meets Section 504 standards for audiences with hearing and visual impairments. Headphones for audio descriptions are available upon request.
